page.title: 10SOUTH CROFTY MINE CAMBORNE
page.content: South Crofty tin mine was{first {established in 1908.}It employs{500 people as miners, engineers, electricians & administrative staff.The mine reaches a depth of{750 {metres}&{7 tons of tin & 1000 tons of {rock}are extracted daily.Compressed air drilling machines are used down the mine.The miners work 7 hour shifts.50 people work night shift.The average wage is{Â£120 per week. Employees are entitled to 25 days holiday & public holidays.There are canteen facilities at the mine & a medical centre to deal with minor accidents.There have been{3 major {accidents over the last 12 years resulting in{14 people seriously {injured.}Tin is transported by road. The mine is thinking of expanding.
